attributes.action: exempt all asthma suffers from the prescription fee charge.
attributes.additional_details: Sometimes my brother doesnt have the money to get his pumps as it's £8.20 per pump when he really needs them i find it hard to see my brother strugle to find the money for his pumps before he has a bad asthma attack and has to go hospital. my brother has a few serious asthma attacks cause he can't afford to buy his pumps when he runs out. i feel all asthma suffers should not pay for their pumps and should be EXEMPT from the perscription charges.
attributes.background: my older brother is an asthma suffer and has to have three different pumps and has to pay £8.20 per pump. i thinks it's wrong for someone to pay for something that saves their life no asthma suffer has control to stop them from getting asthma so why pay for something that will save their lifes.
